item.title: The Spoils of War
item.description: As Germany enters a trade deficit for the first time since 1991, Russia cuts energy flows to Europe in an already inflationary environment, the UK heads for recession while their Parliament is in disarray and their central bank deadset on bringing inflation back to 2%, shortages turn into gluts as Shanghai emerges from lockdown, the â‚¬ trades at parity with the $, Draghi resigns, the European gas price curve has repriced to show shortages continuing into 2024, France nationalizes EDR, another Covid-19 wave is creeping upon us and the EU has in 2 months only managed to provide Ukraine with a ninth of the capital that was originally proposed–I could go on.
